## Release Checklist
- [ ] Self-reviewed changed files.
- [ ] Local smoke test completed for core flow:
  - [ ] Select city -> Generate preview
  - [ ] Toggle water and confirm refresh behavior
  - [ ] PNG/SVG export path works (or expected error path tested)
- [ ] Accessibility sanity:
  - [ ] Keyboard navigation through primary controls/modals
  - [ ] Icon/button labels verified
- [ ] CI is green (`test:ci` workflow).
- [ ] If merged to `main`, GitHub Pages deployment run is successful.
- [ ] If UI changed, visual snapshots/tests are updated and passing.
